OOC Bounty is wearing a temporal space device that makes it nearly 
impossible for lower technology to hit him. (The bat probes and 
autoguns.) Have your main characters fire at him and I'll give you a 
dinner instead of minor damage.

Bounty ducked, sending Darkmouses blast away from him.
The bat probes couldn't get a positive lock on Bounty so they missed. 
The shots from B. Nightmare, Mantys, and Wespa bounced off the 
spinning Bounty. He stopped to soon and a lone shot struck him in the 
side. He stumbled to the side and dropped his blades. Dizzy from all 
the spinning he stumbled around VULNERABLE to any attack. His 
depleted blasters returned to his side. He tried to see straight but 
failed as he staggered against the wall of the Predacon Base.

Finish him at your convenience Airly.
